subject: feat: add PNG icon fallbacks for PWA compatibility
body:
- Generate 192x192, 512x512, and 180x180 (apple-touch) PNGs from SVG
- Update manifest.json with PNG icons alongside SVG
- Use PNG for apple-touch-icon (better iOS support)
- Add PNG fallback favicon for older browsers

https://claude.ai/code/session_018w7ThuzVv2QNHpRDmtwQDA
title: add PNG icon fallbacks for PWA compatibility
